smile.data.formula

Interface Term

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HyperTerm, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBiFunction, AbstractFunction, AbstractTerm, Constant, DoubleFunction, IntFunction, Operator

    public interface Term
extends HyperTerm
    A term is recursively constructed from constant symbols, variables and function symbols. A term returns a single value when applied to a data object (e.g. Tuple).

    • Method Summary

      Returns the optional level of measurements of output values.

      Returns the name of output values.
      default java.util.List<Term> terms()
      Returns the list of terms after expanding the hyperterm.

      Returns the data type of output values.
